14 Gregory Hall
Wbana, Illinois
August 14, 1956
Hr. Maurice F. Seay, Director
Division of Education
W. K. Kellogg Foundation
250 Champion Street
Battle Creek, Michigan
Dear Dr. Seay:
Many thanks for your recent letter interpreting further
a condition of the Foundation grant to the University on
behalf of HAEB. There1 s no problem and. I hops we &onft
hr.'"' any develop, but secretarial-clerical help around
thesi parts Is critical. Just thought wo might have to
go over secretary item if conditions grew worse # so
thought .1 *d better bo ready in case we had to clear a
secretarial item with you.
Had a fine note from Bob the other aay. Sounds like hcfs
real busy in the Philippines. 1 must answer him. That1 a
a tow miles from homo base.
Best regards.
Sincerely,
FESioJf
cc: H, J. Slcomia
Frank E. Bchooley
President
